TopicTitle: are there any mods that do this...?

Articles.Content:
I would like a mod that lets me to dock with another craft and get fuel from it. In addition, I would like to be able to generate fuel somehow, even if it isn\'t the default liquid fuel.

Any mods that do this?
At the moment the game doesn\'t support docking or fuel transfers. As for generating fuel there are a few solar panel/ion engine mods out there that will regenerate your fuel.

> 
> At the moment the game doesn\'t support docking or fuel transfers. As for generating fuel there are a few solar panel/ion engine mods out there that will regenerate your fuel.

Dang, I thought I saw a plugin that did something similar at once point. Well, thanks for the reply!

> 
> Dang, I thought I saw a plugin that did something similar at once point. Well, thanks for the reply!

I thought there was a mod that did that too, actually...

[http://xenolith.ws/?page=mod&id=70](http://xenolith.ws/?page=mod&id=70)

My plugin, could be useful for you.

> 
> [http://xenolith.ws/?page=mod&id=70](http://xenolith.ws/?page=mod&id=70)
> 
> My plugin, could be useful for you.

Hey thanks! That looks awesome, I\'ll definitely get it.

> 
> Hey thanks! That looks awesome, I\'ll definitely get it.

Got the plugin, what exactly does the zo2 filter do? I have that plugin, but not sure what your part does..
IF activated, it filters ZO2 by energy. It\'s a bit overpowered in my opinion, if someone has better values, you\'re welcome.
